endpoints.name: help
endpoints.description: Basic, html-based documentation of the API built from this api.json file.

endpoints.name: generate
endpoints.description: Generates a new Maze from the given height, width, challenge-level, and seed.

arguments.name: height
arguments.description: The height of the maze to generate. This must be a numeric value ranging from MAZE_MIN_HEIGHT to MAZE_MAX_HEIGHT.

arguments.name: width
arguments.description: The width of the maze to generate. This must be a numeric value ranging from MAZE_MIN_WIDTH and MAZE_MAX_WIDTH.

arguments.name: challenge-level
arguments.description: The challenge-level (difficulty) of the maze to generate. This is must be a numeric value from 0 (easiest) to 10 (most difficult).

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: The name of the new maze. This is a string value.

arguments.name: seed
arguments.description: The seed value to use when generating this maze. This is a string value.

endpoints.name: get
endpoints.description: Get a specific maze from the Mazes collection.

arguments.name: mazeId
arguments.description: mazeId is a string concatenation the height, width, challenge-level, name, and seed fields. For example: '3:5:10:TestMaze:SampleSeed'
